summary: BuildRequest contained no stated requirements or acceptance criteria, but the diff introduces multiple functional and UX changes across backend and frontend (including PWA-related metadata/manifest updates, URL param utilities, and marketplace/admin/vendor UI updates).

hallucinated_features.description: Backend actor state/types and authorization/storage mixins modifications (marketplace domain model changes such as Vendor/PublicVendorProfile, carts/orders/products, access control integration).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest, so backend feature work is not traceable to any requested requirement.

hallucinated_features.description: New URL parameter/session persistence utilities for query/hash parsing and sessionStorage management.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified requesting URL param parsing/persistence utilities.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin/vendor/customer frontend UI/UX updates and feature behaviors described in frontend summaries (admin dashboards, orders status buttons, vendor pages, cart/checkout/product page changes, profile modal, global styling, CTA button wrapper).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified requesting these UI pages, styling changes, or behavioral adjustments.

hallucinated_features.description: PWA-related HTML metadata updates (theme-color, apple mobile web app tags, manifest link, apple touch icon).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest for PWA installability or metadata changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Web app manifest updates/creation for PWA (name, icons including maskable, standalone display, colors, orientation, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest for adding/updating a PWA manifest.

hallucinated_features.description: Project state tracking updated/added indicating a pending PWA conversion request (AR-1) and architectural notes.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest to add or modify project state tracking files.
